description: Systematic harvest of 54 operations-research experiments (0 prior lessons) into 2 lessons

f_ops1_wip_cap.noise_zone: cap=4 vs cap=5 gap=0.003-0.049, flips on 10-job window shift

f_ops2_policy_convergence.policy_convergence: all non-FIFO policies converge when one domain signal dominates (39.6 weight, 3.3x)

f_ops3_queue_aging.note: null result due to healthy queue (lag=0, stale=0%)

output.remaining_harvestable: ~5-8 more findings extractable with deeper analysis of automability sweep variants
